meanings.definition: A person who shoots at clay pigeons or targets in trapshooting competitions.
meanings.sent1: The trapshooter hit every clay pigeon with precision.
meanings.sent2: The trapshooter practiced diligently to improve their aim.
meanings.sent3: The trapshooter's accuracy was so good, they could hit a flying saucer!
meanings.sent4: Like a skilled trapshooter, she aimed straight for her goals and never missed.
meanings.sent5: The trapshooter's focus was like a laser beam, always on target.

meanings.definition: One who participates in the sport of trapshooting.
meanings.sent1: Every trapshooter at the competition showed great sportsmanship.
meanings.sent2: The trapshooter enjoyed the camaraderie of fellow competitors.
meanings.sent3: The trapshooter's favorite part of the day was the post-competition barbecue.
meanings.sent4: In the world of trapshooting, each trapshooter is like a member of a big family.
meanings.sent5: The trapshooter's passion for the sport was contagious among their friends.
